body:
Hey guys! This discussion is just gonna be for asking you guys what you would like to see in a map.

Example Questions: 

What gamemode do you want for a map?

What details do you want to be implemented in a map?

Any specific add-ons? 

Please just type whatever you want to see in a map and I'll try to make it happen :)

Thanks!
body_tagged:

title: What do you want to see in a map?

replies.body: I prefer the original Nebula maps, such as Senex I, Quintus, Ternio, and Rendezvous I. The maps with more terrain don't have such good gameplay, in my opinion.
replies.body_tagged: I prefer the original Nebula maps, such as Senex I, Quintus, Ternio, and Rendezvous I. The maps with more terrain don't have such good gameplay, in my opinion.

replies.body: Yup! I am currently building a map, but it doesn't have much terrain, by that I mean it's a very small map xD
replies.body_tagged: Yup! I am currently building a map, but it doesn't have much terrain, by that I mean it's a very small map xD

replies.body: I agree with Blizzem, I like maps with 1 main island for each team, including maybe a smaller central island to fight over, like Senex I. Also i like it when the is a chest with OP gear to race for at the begining :D good luck et477
replies.body_tagged: I agree with Blizzem, I like maps with 1 main island for each team, including maybe a smaller central island to fight over, like Senex I. Also i like it when the is a chest with OP gear to race for at the begining :D good luck et477

replies.body:
I too agree with blizzem as well,
keep it simple , the more complex the less fun. Stick with plain fun maps
replies.body_tagged:
I too agree with blizzem as well,
keep it simple , the more complex the less fun. Stick with plain fun maps

replies.body: I agree, I like maps that have a flat terrain, and have a simple layout. Not too confusing In my opinion...
replies.body_tagged: I agree, I like maps that have a flat terrain, and have a simple layout. Not too confusing In my opinion...

replies.body: Okay, noted it down. Thanks guys for the feedback! Luckily, the map that I am currently building is a small and simple map :)
